Hello blank fragment
//material input Accept EULA You must accept the EULA Please accept our end-user license agreement.\n(Just a dummy)
E-mail Empty or not well-formed Your e-mail will be used as your login. Type the one you use most often.
Password Empty or not 5-chars long Type your own password (5-chars long). Your personal information is protected with this password.
Birthday You must be at least 14. We will use your birthday only to calculate your age (older than 14).
Body height You must be at least 160cm tall. Just another fake input (taller than 160cm).
City Enter a city. We need this information to find you if you mess with us.
Form finished! Notifications
